Éric Besson stressed the need to increase the competitiveness of french sporting venues, adding that he wanted local government to finance all or part the service and access roads to stadiums. the report, wide ranging in scope, also recommends cutting the number of training centres in place of schools of excellence, to allocate money raised from betting to club development and more targeted management of referees. it
